name: Caelum The Board Game
description:
The ancient city of Caelum was created as a result of the peace treaty, The treaty of Caelum, after hundred years of war between the 4 nations: Owl, Raven, Hawk and Pigeon. 

The city was only supposed to be the buffer zone between all 4 nations but because of the city's strategic location, the city thrived and became the jewel of the continent.

Bounded by the treaty, the 4 nations ,now , looks for another way to control the city, a more diplomatic way.

Developers:
